items.title: Weight-loss drugs should be first step to prevent heart disease, top cardiology group says
items.description: Millions more Americans should be taking weight-loss drugs to prevent heart disease, according to the American College of Cardiology.

items.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says AI can rival someone with a PhD—just weeks after saying it’s ready for entry-level jobs. So what’s left for grads?
items.description: As Amazon, OpenAI and Anthropic bosses warn, entry-level corporate jobs are about to get cut, experts say Gen Z don’t need to panic—yet.
